subject: Lacrosse
lead_paragraph: Kevin Cassese, interim coach of the Duke men's lacrosse team,  took a step toward rebuilding the program's damaged reputation by holding his first news conference and planning a trip to New York to meet with recruits.
snippet: Kevin Cassese, interim coach of the Duke men's lacrosse team,  took a step toward rebuilding the program's damaged reputation by holding his first news conference and planning a trip to New York to meet with recruits.
